simple.name: allocationId
simple.description: When performing an allocation on FEI Devices, a unique ID is used to represent the request. In the case of multi-out devices this ID is also required to be used as the connection ID.

simple.name: tunerType
simple.description: Used when performing the tuner allocation request. Valid values are taken from the FEI Specification: TX, RX, CHANNELIZER, DDC, RX_DIGITIZER, RX_DIGTIZIER_CHANNELIZER

struct.name: FEIDevice
struct.description: Information about the FEI Device which will be controlled. Device and port names are required.

simple.name: deviceName
simple.description: The name of the device which will be allocated against.

simple.name: outputPortName
simple.description: The output port of the FEI Device which will be used to make the connection to an input component.

simple.name: tunerPortName
simple.description: The name of the Tuner Port on the device. This port will be used for tuning requests after the initial allocation is made.

struct.description: Information about the component which will be connected to the FEI Device.

simple.name: componentName
simple.description: The name of the component which will be connected to the FEI device.

simple.name: inputPortName
simple.description: The name of the port which will be connected to the FEI device.

simple.name: frequency
simple.description: Frequency in megahertz to tune the device

simple.name: sampleRate
simple.description: Sample rate in mega samples per second to tune the device
